{{< video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1e_r8xZ8n8A >}}

Last week, the fourth Journée Romande de la Géoinformation (JRG) took place 
in Ecublens with more than 800 participants. The video above features some 
impressions and highlights from the conference. 

Now, [all videos and presentations 
of the _plenary_ sessions](https://georomandie.com/) are available to peruse.

Topics of the 2025 JRG were, among others:

- artificial intelligence and GeoAI
- decision-support
- crisis management
- digital twins
- innovations in cartography
- climate change mitigation
